Compose_KQL_for_EmailAttachmentInfo_with.inputs:
EmailAttachmentInfo
| where Timestamp > ago(30d)
| where FileName=~ "@{items('For_each_File')['RawEntity']['friendlyName']}"
| summarize FirstSeen=min(Timestamp), LastSeen=max(Timestamp), Count=count() by FileName,SHA256, FileSize

EmailAttachmentInfo
| where Timestamp > ago(30d)
| where SHA256 =~ "@{items('For_each_FileHash')['RawEntity']['hashValue']}"
| summarize FirstSeen=min(Timestamp), LastSeen=max(Timestamp), Count=count() by FileName,SHA256, FileSize

HTTP_query_the_EmailAttachmentInfo_table.description: Will fail on purpose when SHA256 is not the algorithm, it will use a null URI
